# inputImage

**Instance Property**

The image to use as an input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **height**: The height, in pixels, of the morphological structuring element.
- **width**: The width, in pixels, of the morphological structuring element.
